setting.name: ServerUniqueIdentifier
setting.description: Unique identifier of your TeamSpeak server

setting.name: RequiredUpdateBranch
setting.description: Update branch the plugin must use (Production, Testing)

setting.name: MinimumPluginVersion
setting.description: Lowest plugin version that is requiered on the server (e.g. 0.2)

setting.name: SoundPack
setting.description: Sound Pack that will be used by the plugin

setting.name: IngameChannel
setting.description: TeamSpeak channel the client should get moved into
